description.value:
Source PPZO94102

This outfit includes fine silk or satin garments tailored to complement your figure. In addition, the outfit contains a loose shawl or robe with several discreet pockets for items such as perfume, massage oils, or even a small @Compendium[pf1.weapons-and-ammo.fOSuWwRSZLTrROch]{dagger}.
